name: NO:CLIP
description:
Finally, a 3D game! NO:CLIP is a flappy bird rip off to be honest, but with a twist. NO:CLIP, as the name suggests, this 70th century rocket has the power to noclip levels for a short time to escape them! The idea is still in development so for now, its a flappy bird rip off. The core mechanic is not even done yet :( Check out the BETA version tho, see what you think! This is just a prototype so NO Menu, NO Win Screen, just levels. Will be posting a devlog soon! 

Since my 3D Modelling skills are really amazing, you can see that I have an accurate version of an irl rocket:

The NOCLIP function is there in the developer build, which Ill gladly let you play if you DM me on discord or leave a comment and ill get back to you ASAP. Unfortunately this build doesn't have it yet. Still working on it :)

Soon this game will be a standalone build for linux, windows, and Mac after the beta is complete! An android version? Maybe :) Anyway thanks for checking it out, cya!

Credits:

Thanks BacaMiException, For all those unity tips and feedback.

Thanks for the huge feedback Sanya! Very cool!

Thanks to Mr.Paz28 for pointing out the audio bugs.

Thanks to NCS for the music, TOKYO MACHINE & Guy Arthur - GET UP.

Thanks to you for playing!
